greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of (1+(k-1)*x) / (1+2*(k-1)*x+((k+1)*x)^2).
mathematica: T[n_, 0] := 1; T[n_, k_] := Sum[(-k)^j * Binomial[2*n, 2*j], {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 04 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 04 2020
